## Events.CommentDrag class

Notifies listeners when a comment is being manually dragged/dropped.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CommentDrag extends UiBase 
```
**Extends:** [UiBase](./blockly.events.uibase.md)

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [commentId?](./blockly.events.commentdrag.commentid.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The ID of the top-level comment being dragged. |
|  [isStart?](./blockly.events.commentdrag.isstart.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ True if this is the start of a drag, false if this is the end of one. |
